lead_paragraph: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has signed a two-year contract extension that will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Sunderland Keeper Mannone Extends Contract to 2018
headline.main: Sunderland Keeper Mannone Extends Contract to 2018

snippet: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has signed a two-year contract extension that will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday....
